data.title: Why Strategy (MSTR) Is Down 8.4% After MSCI Considers Index Removal Over Bitcoin Exposure and What's Next
data.description: MSCI is considering removing Strategy Inc. from its major equity indices due to the company's substantial Bitcoin holdings, following warnings from JPMorgan and other market observers about index eligibility concerns and their implications for passive investors. This development spotlights how Strategy's unique position as a corporate Bitcoin proxy may challenge its access to institutional capital and index inclusion despite its operational businesses. We'll explore how the risk of index...
data.keywords: institutional capital, Strategy Inc., Bitcoin price, market observers
